main event: A small round white object was observed going very fast, moving straight up, then down, and to the northwest in Livermore Falls, Maine.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 2 minutes., The object was reported as one small round white object., There were mentions of a possible connection to aircraft due to comments on evaluation., Another witness reported a much larger and brilliantly colored object in the same area on June 7, 1957., The object's rapid and directional changes suggested it was in distress.
